      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.io.File> loadAllFilesFrom(java.lang.String resourceFolderPath)
      Loads all file (and only file, not folder) from the given resource folder path and check if there is at least one file loader.
      java.util.List<java.io.File> loadAllFilesFrom(java.net.URL url)
      Loads all file (and only file, not folder) that are in the folder pointed by the given URL
      java.util.List<java.io.File> loadAllFilesFrom(java.net.URL url, java.util.function.Predicate<java.io.File> predicate)
      Loads all file (and only file, not folder) that are in the folder pointed by the given URL and match the given predicate.
      java.io.File loadFileFrom(java.lang.String folder, java.lang.String name)
      Loads the file that is in the given folder with the given name.
      java.io.File loadFileFrom(java.net.URL url)
      Loads all file (and only file, not folder) that are in the folder pointed by the given URL

      Loads the image icon from the given folder and with the given name.
      java.io.InputStream loadInputStreamFrom(java.lang.String folder, java.lang.String name)
      Loads the file input stream from the file that is in the given folder and that has the given name.

    • Method Detail

      • loadImageIcon

        public final javax.swing.ImageIcon loadImageIcon(java.lang.String folder,
                                                 java.lang.String name)
        Loads the image icon from the given folder and with the given name.
        Parameters:
        folder - Folder (in the resource directory) that contains the file to load.
        name - Name of the image file to load.
        Returns:
        An instance of the image icon corresponding to the loaded image file.
        Throws:
        ResourceFileErrorException - If the file cannot be loaded.

      • loadFileFrom

        public final java.io.File loadFileFrom(java.lang.String folder,
                                       java.lang.String name)
        Loads the file that is in the given folder with the given name.
        Parameters:
        folder - Folder in which the file is.
        name - Name of the file we want to load.
        Returns:
        An instance of the desired file.

      • loadInputStreamFrom

        public final java.io.InputStream loadInputStreamFrom(java.lang.String folder,
                                                     java.lang.String name)
        Loads the file input stream from the file that is in the given folder and that has the given name.
        Parameters:
        folder - Folder in which the file is.
        name - Name of the file we want to load.
        Returns:
        An input stream of the desired file.

      • loadFileFrom

        public final java.io.File loadFileFrom(java.net.URL url)
        Loads all file (and only file, not folder) that are in the folder pointed by the given URL
        Parameters:
        url - Url of a folder from which we want to load file.
        Returns:
        A list of all loaded file (and only file, not folder) from the pointed folder.
        Throws:
        ResourceFileErrorException - If the file cannot be loaded.

      • loadAllFilesFrom

        public final java.util.List<java.io.File> loadAllFilesFrom(java.lang.String resourceFolderPath)
        Loads all file (and only file, not folder) from the given resource folder path and check if there is at least one file loader. An exception is thrown if the given path doesn't lead to a folder.
        Parameters:
        resourceFolderPath - Path of the resource folder in which the file we want to load are.
        Returns:
        A list of file, that were in the folder pointed by the given path.

      • loadAllFilesFrom

        public final java.util.List<java.io.File> loadAllFilesFrom(java.net.URL url,
                                                           java.util.function.Predicate<java.io.File> predicate)
        Loads all file (and only file, not folder) that are in the folder pointed by the given URL and match the given predicate. An exception is thrown if the given path doesn't lead to a folder.
        Parameters:
        url - Url of a folder from which we want to load file.
        predicate - Predicate that will filter files.
        Returns:
        A list of all loaded file (and only file, not folder) from the pointed folder.
        Throws:
        ResourceFileErrorException - If the file cannot be loaded.

      • loadAllFilesFrom

        public final java.util.List<java.io.File> loadAllFilesFrom(java.net.URL url)
        Loads all file (and only file, not folder) that are in the folder pointed by the given URL
        Parameters:
        url - Url of a folder from which we want to load file
        Returns:
        A list of all loaded file (and only file, not folder) from the pointed folder
